name: Rescue All Civilians
description:
"The people need your help Stel! Go rescue them, but try not to get caught. We believe you can do it." 

Play as Stel Thininja as you sneak around and save all the civilians in need of saving.

Use WASD or Left stick on your controller to move Stel.

When in front of doors hold down space, or ps4 'X', or Xbox 'A' to unlock them.

Thanks for playing!
